fields.name: streetAndHouseNumber
fields.description: Street name and house number.

fields.name: zipCodeAndCity
fields.description: Zip code and city name.

fields.name: EndToEndIdentification
fields.description: Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unambiguously identify the transaction.

fields.name: InstructionId
fields.description: Instruction identification.

fields.name: Currency
fields.description: ISO 4217 Alpha 3 currency code.

fields.name: country
fields.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

fields.name: DebtorName
fields.description: Name of the debtor.

fields.name: IBAN
fields.description: The IBAN of this account.

fields.name: BIC
fields.description: Bank Identifier Code.

fields.name: CreateDateTime
fields.description: Must match yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss format. Timestamp of request creation date and time.

fields.name: RequestedExecutionDate
fields.description: Must match yyyy-MM-dd format, also in CET timezone.

fields.name: ControlSum
fields.description: The total sum of all instructed amounts within this request.

fields.name: NumberOfTransactions
fields.description: The total number of payment instructions within this request.

fields.name: PaymentMethod
fields.description: Specifies the means of payment that will be used to move the amount of money. Only TRF allowed for now.

fields.name: BatchBooking
fields.description: Validated as true or false. If present and contains 'true', batch booking is requested. If present and contains 'false', booking per transaction is requested.

fields.name: ChargeBearer
fields.description: Specifies which party/parties will bear the charges associated with the processing of the payment transaction.

fields.name: TransactionStatus
fields.description: Specifies the status of a transaction in a coded form based on Sepa Rulebook.

fields.name: AuthId
fields.description: Authentication ID used to update the SCA status of a SEPA payment. Valid for 5 minutes.

fields.name: PaymentId
fields.description: Payment resource ID generated ('Transaction ID' from the header populated with the intra-bank ID).

fields.name: PaymentProduct
fields.description: The payment product used for the transaction.

fields.name: PaymentTypeInformation
fields.description: Specifies the type of payment transaction.

fields.name: RemittanceInformation
fields.description: Information about the purpose of the payment.

fields.name: CreditorName
fields.description: Name of the creditor.

fields.name: CreditorIBAN
fields.description: The IBAN of the creditor's account.

fields.name: CreditorBIC
fields.description: Bank Identifier Code of the creditor.

fields.name: EndToEndId
fields.description: Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unambiguously identify the transaction.

fields.name: PaymentStatus
fields.description: The status of the payment.

fields.name: TransactionReference
fields.description: Reference for the transaction.

fields.name: TransactionAmount
fields.description: The amount of the transaction.

fields.name: TransactionDate
fields.description: The date of the transaction.

fields.name: TransactionType
fields.description: The type of the transaction.
